author: Special Correspondent
text:
An estimated 1,58,00 children in the age-group 0-5 years were administered polio drops at government hospital, primary health centres, and bus stands and railway stations across the district under the second phase of the campaign for the year.

C. Vijaya Baskar, Minister for Health, inaugurated the campaign at a function held here.

NAGAPATTINAM: K.A. Jayapal, Minister for Fisheries, inaugurated the pulse polio campaign.

S. Palanisamy, District Collector, offered felicitations.

PERAMBALUR: R.P. Marutharaja, Member of Parliament, and R. Tamilselvan, MLA, inaugurated the campaign at the municipal hospital in Perambalur. An official release said that 50,000 children were administered the drops at 383 centres.
title: Thousands get polio vaccine
